text: VALUE = RMA normalized log2 signal intensity

protocol.text: Leaves were incubated in ddH2O containing 50 micromolar ABA for 3 hours
Arabidopsis plants were grown in growth chambers with an 8 hr light/16hr dark, 20oC/18oC cycle, with light intensity of 120 Âµmol m-2s-1.

Three hundred Arabidopsis leaves excised from 60-70 five-week-old plants were used as the starting material for each guard cell microarray. Ten mature leaves taken from 3-4 plants grown side-by side with the plants for guard cell isolation were used for each leaf sample. Total RNA was isolated from each sample using Trizol reagent (Invitrogen). Trizol-isolated RNA was further purified using the Plant RNeasy kit (Qiagen, Valencia, CA).
RNA samples exhibiting a 25S/18S ratio >1.4 and no significant degradation in Bioanalyzer profiles (Agilent Technology, Palo Alto, CA) were used for cDNA and then cRNA synthesis.

protocol.type: nucleic acid hybridization to array protocol
array scanning and feature extraction protocol

text: The RMA method implemented in the affy package in the bioconductor project (
) was used to normalize the data for the entire probe sets using default parameters (PMID: 14960456).
